metadata.Name: ATHAR
metadata.Description: ATHAR is a high-quality and diverse dataset for Classical Arabic to English translation.
metadata.Paper Title: ATHAR: A High-Quality and Diverse Dataset for Classical Arabic to English Translation
metadata.Venue Name: Conference on Empirical Methods in Natural Language Processing
Affiliations: Qatar Computing Research Institute, Hamad Bin Khalifa University
metadata.Abstract: We introduce ATHAR, a new high-quality and diverse dataset for Classical Arabic (CA) to English translation. ATHAR consists of 10K sentences sourced from a wide range of classical Arabic texts, covering various domains and styles. We carefully curate the dataset to ensure high translation quality and diversity, addressing the scarcity of resources for CA-English translation. We present a detailed analysis of the dataset, including its characteristics and challenges. We also conduct experiments on machine translation models trained on ATHAR, demonstrating its effectiveness in improving translation performance. The dataset is publicly available to facilitate research in CA-English translation.
